name: Hallow.in - Halloween Game
description:
Let us introduce you to our last game: Hallow.in!

Hallow.in is a tactical action game with a top down view set in an infinite geometric space.

Hey friends, let’s go party halloween and have some fun! Your goal in this game is to gain as much mass as possible by swallowing smaller shapes (pumpkins etc.) without being swallowed by bigger ones.

**HOW TO PLAY** Swipe to control movements of a shape.

Game features:
+ action arcade game!
+ halloween skins!
+ bright and colorful graphics!
+ halloween app free!

Enjoy yourself with Hallow.in! It’s eat or be eaten, beat or be beaten!
